B

board - Variable in class Connect4
board represents the Connect4 board

C

COLUMNS - Static variable in class Connect4
COLUMNS is the number of columns on the Checker board.
Connect4 - Class in <Unnamed>
The Connect4 class is the logic for the Connect4 game.
Connect4(Socket, Socket, ObjectOutputStream, ObjectOutputStream, ObjectInputStream, ObjectInputStream, int) - Constructor for class Connect4
Initializes the board and height fields.
Connect4Client - Class in <Unnamed>
Runs a Connect4 game that can be play a computer or connect to another through a Connect4Server
Connect4Client() - Constructor for class Connect4Client
 
Connect4ComputerPlayer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a computer player for the Connect4 class.

Connect4GUI - Class in <Unnamed>

Connect4Server - Class in <Unnamed>

Connect4TextConsole - Class in <Unnamed>

D

displayBeginGame(char) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function displays the game mode selected.

This function prints the get game mode message of the game.
displayMessage(String) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole

displayMove(int) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function displays the computers move.
displayPlayerTurn(char) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function displays a message indicating whose turn it is.
displayWinner(int) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function displays the winning message.
displayWrongDisplay() - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This function prints an invalid display mode message.
displayWrongMode() - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
This functions displays an error message if the player selects an invalid mode.

G

getDisplayMode(Scanner) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
gets the display mode: T=text console, G=GUI
getGameMode(Scanner) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole
gets the game mode: C=computer, P=player
getMove(char[][]) - Method in class Connect4ComputerPlayer
This function gets a random move from the computer.
getMove(Scanner) - Method in class Connect4TextConsole

H

heights - Variable in class Connect4
height represents the current height of each column

I

M

R

S

V
